collective-fabric.duskconfig.title: Collective Config
collective-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_transf: When enabled, transfer the held items and armour from replaced entities by any of the Entity Spawn mods which depend on Collective.
collective-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_loopsA: The amount of times Collective loops through possible mob drops to get them all procedurally. Drops are only generated when a dependent mod uses them. Lowering this can increase world load time but decrease accuracy.
collective-fabric.duskconfig.loopsAmount: Loops Amount Used To Get All Entity Drops
collective-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_findAB: The delay of the is-there-a-block-around-check around entities in ms. Used in mods which depends on a specific blockstate in the world. Increasing this number can increase TPS if needed.
collective-fabric.duskconfig.findABlockc: Find A Block Check Around Entities Delay Ms
collective-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_enable: Please check out https://stopmodreposts.org/ for more information on why this feature exists.
Enables pets for Patrons. Will be added in a future release.
